title: There seems to be another war on the horizon.
body:
https://scottstrissel.files.wordpress.com/2013/04/ships1.jpg
The shipping wars have subsided, the true winners have been decided, and another war of meme lords is on the rise.

The combatants are Laughing Fish the conqueror of the M&G boards
https://a.dilcdn.com/bl/wp-content/uploads/sites/25/2015/01/OMD_Next-Pixar-Movie-7_Finding-Nemo.gif
And The fallen King Odarth and his new Dark queen Airman Compsci
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/darksouls/images/8/84/SotFS_ThroneWatcherDefender.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150502084520
This war of course is going to be fought over the M&G throne that the fish created.

Of course I'll be here as well, I have no quarrel with either really, So I'm staying neutral.

Edit: Oh yeah, I'll put anyone that comments a side down below here.
Fish Support-
Queen Support- Airman CompSci, Aqualious18, DarkenedAuras, Huck me farder,  Glory in death, HadesThomas
Crab Support?!- macromite,
Mordehuehuehue- Malicious Metal,
Draco!?!?!?- LuciferDraco.
Probably everyone- Kitty darkstar,
Face the Sun- 4maskwolf

I did say anyone that comments gets a side. even if I didn't even realize it was a side. you can be on your own side.

replies.body: I'll support whoever feeds me, and keeps a pillow for me next to the throne
Or you could just be like my kitten and actually claim all my thrones for herself >_>
Who said I would use the pillow?
Now that's how real cats would think!
Does this mean that you are going to attempt to control the M&G throne?
Pfft, you act like teemo, Hades, and most importantly shaco cant find a way to poison them when you aren't looking.

You act like I am on their side. I only fight as a crab, I will protect the M&G boards from tyranny, that is all.

Fish might've been a vain king, but he was a fair one.

:P

I plan to be a fair queen. I want to help those who join my army and want to improve as players. As I move my way up out of plat and to diamond, I will coach my solider's along the way. I will hold little contests to test their skills and competitions, whether it is small things such as in recruitment or in a game to see if they can beat me and my king. Sure there may be rules to be fair, but they will be guided by thy responses. 

And all I ask in return is loyalty and respect. But once again, that is something to be earned, especially in my kingdom.

*bows*

After fishes betrayal I will not bow to another lord of memes. 
We can work out a truce at best. perhaps a relationship in similar fashion to that of rome and palmyra, those with me are considered your group, but we are still free to do as we wish.

I would simply ask for your defenses should I be "thrown under the bus" as some say. There is not much I can do to control thy anyway, I can simply make suggestion to help improve your gameplay. And also, it gives you the opportunity to join this society (roleplaying like) that will participate in a multitude of rp give aways and eventually...

... like legit no joke, absolutely serious.... 

... actually cookies that can be won through such contests. 

I really just want to help those around me and garner their respect as a player and as a person. 

And as a Queen, that is merely a title. I cannot be treated like one unless I truly deserve it.
An agreement is met.
So I can have your loyalty in this regard then?

Loyalty, no, I serve the board and myself only.

Respect, Sure.
You are of the board.
Damn, you should run for president.
What's your take on this anyway?
I saw mention of cookies! Count me in

Okay... So I'm waiting for a response, but I've basically secured another member to our forces

Just might cost me some patience

I can get you the highest grade of Fish, if you would like

In fact when Laughing Fish falls, you may have first dibs at trying him if you would like
I'll pass on the second offer, he doesn't taste that good
We'll still get you high quality fish if you join us
Can you fix my PC?
Maybe, what's the problem
Well, I think it's somethi- *PC shuts down*
Laptop or Desktop
Laptop

Alright 

1: It's overheating 

Or Maybe

2: The battery is worn

Just leave it for a bit and try again

If that doesn't work than try just using it plugged in

1. Yes.

2. Yes.

I always keep it plugged in, the battery lasts for like a minute

Oh shit son I have that exact issue.

Get a small fan, like this.
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/fzelcF7Hn1w/hqdefault.jpg
And then get something to have the bottom of the laptop elevated, like this.
https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--yqjBrJJq--/18s3p5izrqhi6png.png
and have the fan blow on the laptop, making sure that it hits the bottom of the laptop.

At Least that's how I got my Toaster to function well. should take about 10-20 dollars to get it all rigged up though, depending on fan and stand choice.
They don't really sell fans around here >.>

I know a few less efficient methods.

You could use ice packs, but the more you use it the less you can go without using it, and it will kill it eventually

If you have a spot where you can open windows on two sides of a room or hallway you can create a pseudo wind tunnel, but that one relies on luck and positioning.

You could also just get on and off the pc, giving it ample time to cool between uses, though that really doesn't do much to help.

The fan is the best way to do it though. at least with what I find, given that you can't just get/make a new pc.
It's gonna be a nightmare just finding these things.

It doesn't need to be specific, of course. any fan that you like should do the trick, and the thing on the bottom just needs to be able to let you have air going under it to cool it, hell you could probably work it with pretty much anything, like a cardboard box cut into a wedge with some holes poked through.

I am a thrifty crab, with a legally dead laptop.
Do you use it on a table or somewhere soft (like a bed)

I'm afraid I can't afford a new one, I'm gonna keep using this one for as long as it lasts.
So when it eventually dies, I'll probably vanish from the boards again.
Table

Yeah... My knowledge be limited... But your computer is probably just slowly dying at this point 

You'll want to get a new one soon
Have you tried turning it off and on again?
It does that by itself

You have a deal!
http://rollercon.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/cat-handshake.gif
What is a King to an Emperor?
a king has a kingdom, an emperor has an empire.... and a  {{champion:80}} and {{champion:25}} has cookies

I have cookies. And I am willing to train my army (like irl coach in game) and will attempt to garner the respect of my followers through being a role model to those around me. 

If you are willing to pledge loyalty to me and away from the fish, I will accept you.

Oh, and I have cookies.

Do not forget young one that I made you, and I can unmake you.
http://www.eonline.com/eol_images/Entire_Site/20151110/rs_500x210-151210131251-500-darth-vader-dont-make-me-destroy-you.gif
Bring it on. I will be loved and revered by my people. It is only a matter of time.

...Did you say cookies?
https://media.giphy.com/media/EKUvB9uFnm2Xe/giphy.gif

Yes, wish to join the Queen...

We could use the... Soon to be

Prince of Crazy on our side

Did someone say "crazy"?
http://img15.deviantart.net/1167/i/2010/190/7/a/crazy_spongebob_by_mpn5379.jpg
